creditline: Bequest of John R. Van Derlip in memory of Ethel Morrison Van Derlip
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: sash, red warp with broad purple, gold, and green horizontal stripes; and narrow ones of silver, gold, and purple; orange weft under gold threads, cream under silver; long purple fringe at one end with occasional gold balls; some at other end in green; woven fabric
title: Sash
